column4: I'm trying to install 11.10 with WUBI, but the installer doesnt look the same as all the tutorials. Specifically, it doesn't have the option to actually install inside windows. only reboot.
installing with Wubi means installing inside wubi.  There is no option
wubi is always inside windows.
If you're using wubi, you're installing inside windows
mine WUBI installer doesnt look like this: http://www.ubuntu.com/sites/www.ubuntu.com/files/active/Installer.jpg
What is different about how it looks?  (does it say 11.10 at the top like the picture?)
this is what my installer looks like: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12195493/wubi.png
mmm, what did you double click to open that window?
yes
i downloaded from: http://www.ubuntu.com/download/ubuntu/windows-installer
what did you double click?
wubi.exe
That's curious: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/WubiGuide

I just deleted and redownloaded it, now it looks like that. very. very. strange. Also I downloaded a .iso a day ago, and it had the same WUBI screen. But now, this 3rd and final download presents the screen in the tutorial. this is SSOOOO frustrating!!!!!
the regular CDs have wubi on them
trying to figure it out
do you have teamviewer?
no, but the third time i downloaded wubi it present the proper screeen & is installing now
thank you though :)
oh, yay :)
sure, but I didn't do anything!
